bioconda.name: bioconductor-rankprod
bioconda.summary: Rank Product method for identifying differentially expressed genes with application in meta-analysis

biotools.summary: Non-parametric method for identifying differentially expressed (up- or down- regulated) genes based on the estimated percentage of false predictions (pfp). The method can combine data sets from different origins (meta-analysis) to increase the power of the identification.

bioschemas.name: RankProd
bioschemas.summary: Non-parametric method for identifying differentially expressed (up- or down- regulated) genes based on the estimated percentage of false predictions (pfp). The method can combine data sets from different origins (meta-analysis) to increase the power of the identification.
